answers.author: Leslie Beauregard
answers.text:
Greg, our process can be found at www.charlottesville.org/budget and go to FY 2015 Budget Development.  It's the FY 2015 Agency Budget Review Process.  It's also for human services agencies but a few years ago, we also included arts and cultural agencies.  Hope this helps.


Greg, our process can be found at www.charlottesville.org/budget and go to FY 2015 Budget Development.  It's the FY 2015 Agency Budget Review Process.  It's also for human services agencies but a few years ago, we also included arts and cultural agencies.  Hope this helps.

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I have a member looking for new ways/processes to fund non-profits.  Specifically, do any cities have a process to selecting which arts or cultural nonprofit will get the funds? 
Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
title: Funding Cultural Non-profits
